所有类和接口

类
说明
AclUtil
Acl utilities.
AnonymousPrincipal
Anonymous principal.
ClientException
Jersey exception encapsulating an error from the client (BAD_REQUEST).
CorsFilter
Filter used to handle CORS requests.
ForbiddenClientException
Unauthorized access to the resource exception.
HeaderBasedSecurityFilter
A header-based security filter that authenticates an user using the "X-Authenticated-User" request header as the user ID.
IIOProviderContextListener
Takes care of registering and de-registering local ImageIO plugins (service providers) for the servlet context.
IPrincipal
Interface of principals.
JwtBasedSecurityFilter
This filter is used to authenticate the user having an active session by validating a jwt token.
RequestContextFilter
Filter used to process a couple things in the request context.
RestUtil
Rest utilities.
SecurityFilter
An abstract security filter for user authentication, that injects corresponding users into the request.
ServerException
Jersey exception encapsulating an error from the client (INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR).
TokenBasedSecurityFilter
This filter is used to authenticate the user having an active session via an authentication token stored in database.
UserPrincipal
Authenticated users principal.
ValidationUtil
Utility class to validate parameters.
